Question: This person was frustrated, at first, because she did not understand that every object had a word uniquely identifying it.
Hints: This person wrote The World I Live In in 1908 giving readers an insight into how she felt about the world.
Helen Adams **** (June 27, 1880 – June 1, 1968) was an American author, political activist, and lecturer.
This person suffered a series of strokes in 1961 and spent the last years of her life at her home.
